storyPage.title: The Chronicles
storyPage.desc: The official lore, timeline, and the beginning of the Great Chaos War.

chapter1.label: Chapter One
chapter1.title: The World of Luna
chapter1.p1: There once existed a vast world upon a crescent-shaped lunar island known as Luna. All known and unknown beings lived there in peace and balance, untouched by fear or conflict.
chapter1.p2: Across the ages, Luna prospered. Its cities and strongholds stood firm, and its people lived securely within a stable order that knew nothing of tyranny or chaos.
chapter1.quote: "Peace was not fragile… we simply believed it was eternal."
chapter1.p3: Yet in secrecy, dark forces moved in silence, waiting for the moment to descend upon this tranquil world.

chapter2.label: Chapter Two
chapter2.title: Rise of the King of Chaos
chapter2.p1: Movarth emerged — a hybrid creature born of Orc and Ghoul blood, colossal in form and overwhelming in power. He drew his strength from the dark mastermind Shuran, the one who commanded the force of rampant chaos.
chapter2.p2: By Shuran’s command, the armies of chaos marched upon Lunvor, the capital of Luna. One by one, Luna’s knights fell before Movarth’s crushing might, and the great fortresses could not withstand the onslaught.
chapter2.quote: "When Movarth stood upon the battlefield, courage broke before steel."
chapter2.p3: From that day forward, Movarth was known as the King of Chaos, and a dark era descended upon Luna unlike anything it had ever known.

chapter3.label: Chapter Three
chapter3.title: The Two Masterminds
chapter3.p1: For hundreds of years, Luna remained under the rule of the King of Chaos, its people living in oppression and ruin — until visitors from Earth arrived, known as the Two Masterminds.
chapter3.p2: Though strangers to Luna, the masterminds chose to stay. They analyzed the chaos, rebuilt what had been destroyed, and devised precise plans to bring an end to Movarth and his armies.
chapter3.quote: "We were not born of this world… but we refused to let it burn."
chapter3.p3: The final battle erupted, and the Two Masterminds and their allies triumphed over the armies of chaos. Movarth was defeated by Luna’s champion, Boda Aban, and the conflict was forever recorded in history as the Great Chaos War.

storyPage.moreChaptersDesc: The story of Luna is vast and ever-expanding. Join our Discord community to discover new chapters as they unfold.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Luna.

q1.question: What is Luna?
q1.answer: Luna is a massive, integrated fantasy world built on Discord. It features over 200 unique characters, rich lore spanning centuries, and a unique strategic card game called Luna Fantasy.

q2.question: How do I join the community?
q2.answer: Simply click the "Join Discord" button to access our Discord server. Once there, you can create your character and start your journey in the Luna universe.

q3.question: Is Luna free to play?
q3.answer: Yes! Luna is completely free to join and play. Simply join our Discord community and start your adventure.

q4.question: How does the card game work?
q4.answer: Each player holds 5 cards of different rarities (Common, Rare, Epic, Unique + 1 Random). The game is about strategy and predicting your opponent's moves. Higher tier doesn't always guarantee victory!

q5.question: Can I create my own character?
q5.answer: Absolutely! Our community encourages creativity. You can create original characters that fit within the Luna universe and participate in ongoing storylines.

q6.question: What languages are supported?
q6.answer: Luna supports both Arabic and English. Our website and community welcome players from all backgrounds.
